thread.title: Chelsea captain John Terry leads tributes to England legend Frank Lampard after retiring aged 38, calling him ‘the GREATEST Chelsea player ever’
thread.title_full: Chelsea captain John Terry leads tributes to England legend Frank Lampard after retiring aged 38, calling him ‘the GREATEST Chelsea player ever’

author: dfraser
title: Chelsea captain John Terry leads tributes to England legend Frank Lampard after retiring aged 38, calling him ‘the GREATEST Chelsea player ever’
text:
EFL 'Love ya Lampsy' Chelsea captain John Terry leads tributes to England legend Frank Lampard after retiring aged 38, calling him ‘the GREATEST Chelsea player ever’ 
Blues skipper posts message for former club and country colleague, saying it was 'an absolute pleasure' to play with him By Dave Fraser
